definition: large place used for a specific purpose/stage/scene (of a play)/classifier for sporting or recreational activities/classifier for number of exams
threshing floor/classifier for events and happenings: spell, episode, bout

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: Please check back periodically for congresses we will cover.
sentences.chinese: 我們將奉上會議現場報道，請定期回來查看。

sentences.english: Reporters wishing to attend the conference in-person must have a valid press credential for access.
sentences.chinese: 想要到現場報道的記者必須有一個有效記者證來進場。

sentences.english: This event will be covered live by TV.
sentences.chinese: 此事將由電視作現場報道。

sentences.english: Show some students' report to class and check them.
sentences.chinese: 讓學生通過由易到難的現場報道。

sentences.english: Satellites have extended the power of communications to report events at the instant of occurrence.
sentences.chinese: 人造衛星拓展了通訊能力，可以對事件進行現場報道。
